name: Solar Access Program
description: 20% off electricity bill; stacks with CARE/FERA for up to 55% total savings
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy's Solar Access Program provides significant electricity bill discounts for income-qualified residents living in Environmental Justice Communities, stackable with other discounts for up to 55% savings.
whatTheyOffer:
- 20% off electricity bill
- Stacks with CARE/FERA discounts
- Up to 55% total savings possible
- Available in Environmental Justice Communities
- No solar installation required
- Access to community solar benefits
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must live in qualifying Environmental Justice Community
3. Must meet income eligibility requirements
4. Verify qualification on Solar Access webpage
5. Complete enrollment process
6. Discount applied to monthly bill
